subsc: Railways,Central government administration,Ports, waterways and shipping,Roads and highways
trustfund:
TF025093-PHRD-SECOND TRANSPORT SECTOR PROJECT,TF022545-PHRD-WOMEN'S INITIATIVE
            PILOT SUPPORT PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Transport Sector Project
            seeks to improve the supply and performance of transport
            infrastructure to create an environment for improved
            economic growth through expanded access and reduced
            transport costs. There are eleven project components. 1)
            Institutional building and reforms will support
            institutional strengthening measures in all other
            components. 2) Modernization of the Land Transport
            Department will support the reform of the testing systems
            for the processing of drivers' licenses, the full
            computerization of the Department, facility improvements,
            etc. 3) Sustainable and transparent financing of the road
            sub-sector will support the improvement of the management of
            the Road Fund. 4) Promotion of private sector involvement in
            sector will support the privatization of infrastructure and
            transport entities. 5) Environment will support measures to
            improve the environmental policy. 6) Road maintenance,
            rehabilitation, and construction will support the
            strengthening and maintenance of paved roads. 7) Railways
            will finance track renewals and related measures. 8) Civil
            aviation will support the rehabilitation of the main runway
            and facilities of the Dakar airport. 9) Modernization and
            development of the maritime and river transport sector will
            finance the expansion works for the container terminal at
            the port of Dakar. 10) Rural transport will support the
            design of a rural transport strategy. 11) Coordination will
            finance incremental recurrent costs, etc.
